title: S5 Ep19: S5, The State v. Jeff Titus - Addendum 10

description:
January 28, 2021 / This week, Rebecca Lavoie hosts the addendum with Susan SImpson and special guest, Preet Bharara as they discuss episode 10 of the Jeff Titus case as well as criminal justice overall.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
